label: 院昇殿
対訳語: wait in attendance on the Ex-Sovereign
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: To be permitted to enter the presence of the Ex-Sovereign (In) and to wait on him. Those who had this privilege were known as the In-no-denjōbito (Courtiers in Attendance on the Ex-Sovereign ). All this was patterned after the shōden (to wait in attendance on the Sovereign ).
